relation: Transforms into a Magic Circle along with Hector. Invincible while transformed
Transforms into a Magic Circle along with Hector. Press the attack button to do a dash attack
Transforms into a Magic Circle along with Hector. Press the attack button to strike using blades
textBeforeTable: Tier One - Basic Form The Mage-types' chart is directly related to the Fairies', wherein you can arrive at the creation of four possible full-evolutionary types whose collection of black-magic spells could add up to any number. While varying in stat-potential, all Mage-types in a given tier share the same appearance (sans staff) with one exception: The tier-four mage on the far right is the class' only female. Mages by their very appearance raise Hector's strength and his overall constitution. Chart Analysis Evolution Chart Mage Type   Curse of Darkness Arsenal
textAfterTable: Lightning Strike Earned through enemy defeats 8 Hearts Brings lightning down on foes' heads Tier Two Forms Devil Name Effect on Hector's Stats Devil Image Scissor Rod + STR and CON Crystals Needed   40 Description "Wields a sharp, sword-like rod. Has the potential to unleash powerful magic." Since there is little difference in appearance between respective mage evolutions, we'll simply say that the Scissor Rod is noted as having more heart potential than its predecessor though less of an offensive force than any other mage type.
